author: tanishqjasoria
content:
we(nethermind) are also working on fixing the archive storage to work with verkle tree
it might be released in a month or two

author: milos88
content: good to know. are you taking the same approach that I described or something else?

author: tanishqjasoria
content: kind of, for archive state we will only store the leaf nodes and no internal nodes

author: milos88
content: but in that case you won't be able to create the proof for it, correct? which is fine, just wanted to be sure

author: tanishqjasoria
content: yes, no proofs for historical state
